message.body: So DC is supposed to get 8-12" of snow Wednesday, forecasting "heavy snow and wind" wed. afternoon and evening. If its bad, can I stay with you an extra night? If you're giving me your house key anyway I can just walk back to your place after my interview (I'm guessing you'll still be at work) and figure it out.
Slash it is supposed to start getting shitty tonight now - will you still be going to your thing tonight? If not I would come down earlier than 9
Also do you guys have a snow shovel (so I don't get trapped in your driveway)?
Did you go back to work? Also did it stop snowing?
No and yes. What's your plan? I have to go back for ~1.5h at some point but will prob hang around here for another hr or so
Yes to both caffeine is readily available

Oh. Ok. I am sleepy. I have been asleep since 2:30 and i feel like i just asked you delirious questions but i dont remember what they were. I'm trying to decide whether I feel more guilty about not going home cause its not snowy, or afraid the roads are icy. Probs more the second one. Do you have caffeinated things / is there a coffee shop nearby?
Also right now it's mostly just melty outside but I'd be a little worried that it would freeze over as it gets later and colder
Yeah okay. Ill be down in a sec
